title: Spiced pumpkin and beetroot cake with cream cheese frosting
description: Adding grated beetroot and squash makes for a really moist, flavourful cake that's full of vitamins.
ingredients: 175g/6oz sultanas soaked in 1 tbsp dark rum for 20 minutes, then drained
100g/3½oz grated beetroot, a mixture of yellow and striped varieties
400g/14oz (peeled weight) pumpkin or butternut squash, grated
3 free-range eggs, whites only (use pasteurised egg whites if serving to pregnant women, children or the elderly)
